languages.text: {n}Молниеносно выхватив пистолет из кобуры, Владайм... улыбается.{/n} "Я скучал по этому. Все, кому я плачу троны — к бою!"
{n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I've missed this. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молниеносно выхватив пистолет из кобуры, Владайм... улыбается.{/n} "Я скучал по этому. Все, кому я плачу троны — к бою!"

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆以闪电般的速度，从枪套里拔出了手枪，然后……微笑起来。{/n}“这还真是没想到。所有人，既然你们都拿了我的钱，那就都得上战场！”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I've missed this. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆以闪电般的速度，从枪套里拔出了手枪，然后……微笑起来。{/n}“这还真是没想到。所有人，既然你们都拿了我的钱，那就都得上战场！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは光のように速くホルスターからピストルを取り出し、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「懐かしいな。おい、全員聞け！私がスローンを払うということが何を意味するのか…戦闘開始！」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I've missed this. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは光のように速くホルスターからピストルを取り出し、ニヤリと笑った。{/n}「懐かしいな。おい、全員聞け！私がスローンを払うということが何を意味するのか…戦闘開始！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym saca su pistola de la funda rápido como un rayo y sonríe.{/n} «He echado de menos esto. Todos, y cuando digo todos es todos, ¡a la batalla!».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I've missed this. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym saca su pistola de la funda rápido como un rayo y sonríe.{/n} «He echado de menos esto. Todos, y cuando digo todos es todos, ¡a la batalla!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym zieht blitzschnell seine Pistole aus ihrem Halfter und ... lächelt.{/n} "Ach, ich habe das vermisst. Alle Mann — und das schließt jeden ein, dem ich Thronmünzen bezahle — in den Kampf!"
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I've missed this. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym zieht blitzschnell seine Pistole aus ihrem Halfter und ... lächelt.{/n} "Ach, ich habe das vermisst. Alle Mann — und das schließt jeden ein, dem ich Thronmünzen bezahle — in den Kampf!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Rapide comme l'éclair, Vladaym sort son pistolet de son étui et... sourit.{/n} « Ah, ça m'avait manqué. Vous tous, c'est-à-dire ceux que je paie... à l'attaque ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I've missed this. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Rapide comme l'éclair, Vladaym sort son pistolet de son étui et... sourit.{/n} « Ah, ça m'avait manqué. Vous tous, c'est-à-dire ceux que je paie... à l'attaque ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, yıldırım hızıyla tabancasını çekip... Gülümsüyor.{/n} "Özlemişim be. Millet! Cebinize gelt giriyorsa savaşacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is lightning-fast as he whips his pistol out of its holster and... smiles.{/n} "I've missed this. Everyone — if I pay you thrones, that means you — to battle!"

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
